title: Tony Kiritsis
description:
Former FBI agent and criminal profiler Candice DeLong digs into the mind of Tony Kiritsis. Tony kidnapped the president of his mortgage company, strapped a gun to the back of his head, and held him hostage for a tense 63 hour standoff.

Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. https://wondery.app.link/killerpsyche

Please support us by supporting our sponsors!
